import React, { useState } from 'react'; const BookingForm = () => { const [formData, setFormData] = useState({ name: '', email: '', phone: '', date: '', time: '', players: '', turf: '', message: '' }); const [isSubmitting, setIsSubmitting] = useState(false); const [isSubmitted, setIsSubmitted] = useState(false); const timeSlots = [ { value: '06:00', label: '6:00 AM' }, { value: '07:00', label: '7:00 AM' }, { value: '08:00', label: '8:00 AM' }, { value: '17:00', label: '5:00 PM' }, { value: '18:00', label: '6:00 PM' }, { value: '19:00', label: '7:00 PM' }, { value: '20:00', label: '8:00 PM' }, { value: '21:00', label: '9:00 PM' } ]; const playerOptions = [ { value: '5', label: '5-a-side (₹299/player)' }, { value: '7', label: '7-a-side (₹399/player)' }, { value: '11', label: '11-a-side (₹499/player)' } ]; const turfOptions = [ { value: 'turf1', label: 'Premium Turf - Andheri West' }, { value: 'turf2', label: 'Elite Turf - Bandra East' }, { value: 'turf3', label: 'Pro Turf - Powai' }, { value: 'turf4', label: 'Champion Turf - Juhu' } ]; const handleChange = (e) => { const { name, value } = e.target; setFormData(prev => ({ ...prev, [name]: value })); }; const handleSubmit = async (e) => { e.preventDefault(); setIsSubmitting(true); // Simulate API call await new Promise(resolve => setTimeout(resolve, 2000)); setIsSubmitting(false); setIsSubmitted(true); // Reset form after 3 seconds setTimeout(() => { setIsSubmitted(false); setFormData({ name: '', email: '', phone: '', date: '', time: '', players: '', turf: '', message: '' }); }, 3000); }; const getMinDate = () => { const today = new Date(); const tomorrow = new Date(today); tomorrow.setDate(tomorrow.getDate() + 1); return tomorrow.toISOString().split('T')[0]; }; if (isSubmitted) { return (

Booking Submitted Successfully!

Thank you for choosing Kickora! We've received your booking request and will confirm your slot within 2 hours.

You'll receive a confirmation email with all the details and payment instructions.

); } return (

Book Your Slot

Ready to play? Fill out the form below and we'll get you on the field in no time!

{/* Form */}
